heading: First international concert
body: We are stoked to announce that we will perform at the Metal Magic Warmup Party in Fredericia, Denmark on Walpurgis Night (April 30). Our first gig abroad!

heading: Debut LP released today!
body: Our debut album Katakombernas Kakofoni is finally out TODAY! Order from Jawbreaker Records.

heading: Tyrannosatan Online
body: Website launched today. "Social" media will be closed down soon. Follow us here or with RSS for ill omens and other prophetic visions of the future.
